price: 7. Mpe bazalaki kornona maye bazali kosala na bandimi.
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
